skills.skill: American Heart Association Basic Life Support

duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide high-quality patient care in a healthcare environment, collaborating with physicians to ensure the best outcomes.
Maintain high safety standards and adhere to professional development & nursing education.
Obtain and maintain valid Texas RN license, as well as other required credentials and certifications as defined by unit/service line.
Contribute to ongoing education and research efforts in collaboration with the Weill Medical College of Cornell University and New York-Presbyterian Hospital.
Direct millions of research dollars into patient care and contribute to the latest innovations in medical, surgical, and diagnostic techniques.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science degree or higher from an accredited School of Nursing
